newsitem.title: UK: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - Jan 5.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - Jan 5.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in two London-based Arabic-language newspapers on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Egyptian company signs $20 million contract to export food to Iraq.
- United Arab Emirates gross domestic product rose nine percent to $42.7 billion in 1996.
- Company to be formed on Sunday to run a $1 billion satellite system in the United Arab Emirates.
- Doha Bank net profits will exceed 34 million riyals this year, its chairman says.
- Foreign investment in Jordan shares rose to $56 million in 1996.
